Package application

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
application.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
AccountDatabase holds the logic for getting and setting variables in the AccountDatabase class.
Author:
Kiernan King and Ahmed Alghazwi

      private int find(Account account)
      The find method checks to see if we can find the appointment in the system.
      Parameters:
      account - Object of type Account.
      Returns:
      the index if found, or NOT_FOUND if not found.

      public boolean open(Account account)
      The open method adds an account to the list of accounts if it does not exist already.
      Parameters:
      account - Object of type Account.
      Returns:
      true if we are able to successfully open the new account.

    • close

      public boolean close(Account account)
      The 'close' method closes an account from the list of accounts.
      Parameters:
      account - Object of type Account.
      Returns:
      true if closed, false if account not found.

    • deposit

      public void deposit(Account account)
      The deposit method deposits a given amount into a given account.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Account account)
      The withdraw method withdraws a certain amount from a given account.
      Parameters:
      account - Object of type Account.
      Returns:
      true if withdrawn successfully, false if not.
